trans-unit.source: Custom probes allows you to have more granular control about health monitoring status for your back end pool of servers.
trans-unit.target: Custom probes allows you to have more granular control about health monitoring status for your back end pool of servers.

trans-unit.source: You can change the interval checks, failed request threshold and timeout settings.
trans-unit.target: You can change the interval checks, failed request threshold and timeout settings.

trans-unit.source: This article will guide you to create an application gateway with a custom probe or adding a custom probe to an existing application gateway.
trans-unit.target: This article will guide you to create an application gateway with a custom probe or adding a custom probe to an existing application gateway.
